[IMAGE] 	[IMAGE]   Are you interested in getting an education in a high tech area such as computer networking or web development? [IMAGE] There are 70 ITT Technical Institutes located in 28 states that offer associate degree programs in some of today's hottest technical areas.   With our convenient 3 day-per-week class schedule*, hands-on lab work, and career services, you can earn a degree from ITT Tech and prepare yourself for today's job market.    To find out more about ITT Tech, visit our website www.itt-tech.edu/nc   ITT TECH Education for the future   *Our locations in Pennsylvania have a 4 day-per-week class schedule
